list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: update web manifest and image assets for improved branding
- Updated site.webmanifest to include new icon paths and added purpose attributes for better compatibility. - Removed outdated favicon and logo images, replacing them with new assets for a refreshed look. - Adjusted image references in templates to point to the new logo files, ensuring consistent branding across the application.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Default task

feat: enhance user account and banking features
- Updated user profile creation to use get_or_create to prevent IntegrityError. - Added post_save signal to automatically create UserProfile and accounts upon user registration. - Implemented deposit and payment functionalities with real-time processing. - Enhanced user experience with greeting messages based on the time of day. - Improved admin interface for banking models with better field organization and display. - Integrated Brevo API for email notifications and streamlined email sending process. - Added new forms for deposit and payment methods, ensuring proper validation. - Updated templates for a more responsive design and improved user navigation.
chore: update requirements to include dj-database-url
refactor: streamline build process and update environment variables
chore: add psycopg2-binary to requirements for PostgreSQL support
chore: update requirements to include gunicorn and packaging
chore: add whitenoise to requirements for improved static file handling

feat: implement security question feature for user registration and login
- Added security question and answer fields to the CustomUser model. - Updated registration view to require a security question and answer. - Modified login view to verify user identity using the security question. - Adjusted templates to include security question selection during registration. - Removed email verification code generation and related logic.

feat: implement security question feature for user registration and login
- Added security question and answer fields to the CustomUser model. - Updated registration view to require a security question and answer. - Modified login view to verify user identity using the security question. - Adjusted templates to include security question selection during registration. - Removed email verification code generation and related logic.

feat: add security question verification for user login
- Implemented a new view to verify the user's security question during login. - Added logic to handle session expiration and incorrect answers. - Enhanced user experience with success and error messages. - Updated templates to render the security question form conditionally.
refactor: update CustomUserAdmin to display security question
fix: update URL name for pay bills path to use hyphen instead of underscore
refactor: clean up sidebar by removing unused links for Pay Bills and Loans

feat: enhance dashboard with investment and insurance details
- Added new URL paths for investment and insurance details in the dashboard. - Updated views to include investment and insurance functionalities. - Included static file loading in the accounts template. - Refactored quick actions section to optimize layout and remove unused links.

feat: add more services section to dashboard
- Introduced a new URL path for the more services feature in the dashboard. - Updated the quick actions template to link to the new more services page. - Enhanced the quick actions section with conditional styling for the active link.

refactor: overhaul more services page layout and structure
- Replaced the template structure with a complete HTML document. - Updated the styling and layout to enhance user experience. - Improved accessibility and responsiveness with Tailwind CSS integration. - Adjusted navigation link to point directly to the dashboard.
fix: update navigation links to point to the home page and load static files in loans template
fix: update mobile navigation to consolidate profile and settings links into a single entry and ensure proper conditional rendering in accounts content

feat: add investment and insurance policy forms and views
- Introduced InvestmentForm and InsurancePolicyForm for creating and updating investments and insurance policies. - Added new views for handling investment and insurance policy creation. - Updated URLs to include paths for new investment and insurance policy forms. - Enhanced templates to support dynamic loading of forms via HTMX.

feat: add TradingView Ticker Tape widget to banking dashboard
- Integrated TradingView Ticker Tape widget for displaying stock information. - Adjusted main content padding for better layout consistency. - Updated template structure to include the new widget while maintaining existing functionality.

feat: enhance login functionality and update dashboard metrics
- Added a method to the LoginForm to retrieve the authenticated user after validation. - Removed the security question verification URL from accounts URLs. - Updated the user_login view to handle HTMX-aware redirects upon successful login. - Introduced a new metrics_update view to provide transaction metrics via HTMX. - Updated the dashboard home view to include transaction metrics and adjusted the template for better rendering. - Refactored recent transactions display for improved layout and performance.

feat: add SWIFT code display and enhance deposit form functionality
- Added SWIFT code to user profile and accounts templates for better banking information visibility. - Updated DepositForm to filter accounts based on the authenticated user. - Implemented account number generation logic to ensure numeric-only account numbers upon creation. - Enhanced send_money view to create checking accounts with the new account number format.

feat: add news page and integrate real-time news fetching
- Introduced a new view for the News page that fetches real-time headlines from Gnews.io using the NEWS_API_KEY. - Updated settings to include NEWS_API_KEY for API integration. - Added a new URL pattern for the News page in the pages app. - Enhanced landing page with a navigation link to the News page. - Improved CSS for hero backgrounds and other sections for better visual presentation.

feat: update requirements.txt with new dependencies for enhanced functionality
- Added various libraries including aiodns, aiohttp, celery, and django-allauth to support asynchronous operations, task management, and user authentication. - Included additional packages for improved data handling, web scraping, and real-time features. - Updated existing dependencies to ensure compatibility with the latest versions.
feat: update requirements.txt with new dependencies for enhanced functionality
feat: update requirements.txt with new dependencies for enhanced functionality
feat: update requirements.txt with new dependencies for enhanced functionality

feat: update web manifest and image assets for improved branding
- Updated site.webmanifest to include new icon paths and added purpose attributes for better compatibility. - Removed outdated favicon and logo images, replacing them with new assets for a refreshed look. - Adjusted image references in templates to point to the new logo files, ensuring consistent branding across the application.
